cleanup: div[starts-with(@class, 'sharedaddy') or @id='wp_rp_first' or @class='box-fb-pageplugin' or @id='fb-root' or starts-with(@class, 'fb-comments')]
div[starts-with(@class, 'fb-social-plugin') or starts-with(@class, 'tags') or @id='comments' or @id='social' or @class='postnav']

div[@class='da-title-first' or @id='snsBar1st' or @class='related' or @id='snsBar2nd' or starts-with(@class,'fb-comments')]

script[contains(text(),'feed.mikle.com') or contains(@src,'feed.mikle.com') or contains(text(),'newmofu.doorblog.jp') or contains(text(),'news-channel.doorblog.jp') or contains(text(),'giko-news.com')]

iframe[starts-with(@class,'twitter-share-button') or contains(@src, 'www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php') or contains(@src, 'apis.google.com') or @class='hatena-bookmark-button-frame' or contains(@src, 'accounts.google.com')]
